entry.title: Tuesday night: Periods of light snow mixed with ice pellets. Low minus 12.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Periods of light snow or ice pellets beginning this evening. Wind east 20 km/h. Low minus 12. Wind chill near minus 20. Forecast issued 6:25 PM CST Tuesday 27 December 2022

entry.title: Wednesday: Periods of snow mixed with ice pellets. High minus 4.
entry.summary: Periods of snow or ice pellets ending in the afternoon then cloudy. Snow and ice pellet amount 2 cm. Wind east 20 km/h becoming light in the afternoon. High minus 4. Wind chill minus 20 in the morning and minus 7 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 6:25 PM CST Tuesday 27 December 2022

entry.title: Wednesday night: Periods of light snow. Low minus 6. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of light snow overnight with risk of freezing drizzle. Fog patches overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 6. Wind chill near minus 10. Forecast issued 6:25 PM CST Tuesday 27 December 2022
